name: FlyDropShadows
description: Drop shadow class with type-safe access to drop shadow values

values.xs: BoxShadow(color: Color.fromRGBO(0, 0, 0, 0.05), offset: Offset(0.0, 1.0), blurRadius: 1.0, spreadRadius: 0.0)
values.sm: BoxShadow(color: Color.fromRGBO(0, 0, 0, 0.15), offset: Offset(0.0, 1.0), blurRadius: 2.0, spreadRadius: 0.0)
values.md: BoxShadow(color: Color.fromRGBO(0, 0, 0, 0.12), offset: Offset(0.0, 3.0), blurRadius: 3.0, spreadRadius: 0.0)
values.lg: BoxShadow(color: Color.fromRGBO(0, 0, 0, 0.15), offset: Offset(0.0, 4.0), blurRadius: 4.0, spreadRadius: 0.0)
values.xl: BoxShadow(color: Color.fromRGBO(0, 0, 0, 0.1), offset: Offset(0.0, 9.0), blurRadius: 7.0, spreadRadius: 0.0)
values.2xl: BoxShadow(color: Color.fromRGBO(0, 0, 0, 0.15), offset: Offset(0.0, 25.0), blurRadius: 25.0, spreadRadius: 0.0)
